text: The 1984–85 season was Clydebank's nineteenth season after being elected to the Scottish Football League. They competed in Scottish League Division One where they finished 2nd. They also competed in the Scottish League Cup and Scottish Cup. ==Results== ===Division 1=== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" ! Match Day ! Date ! Opponent ! H/A ! Score !
